name: Acid
rules: Does d6 damage on contact.

name: Antivenoms
rules: Allows a re-roll of a failed Save vs Poison if applied immediately. Only works vs mundane poisons.

name: Binoculars
rules: For looking at stuff.

name: Caltrops
rules: Cover a 10 foot area. Save vs Hazards or suffer d4 damage when walking through.

name: Camera
rules: For taking pictures of stuff.

name: Climbing Gear
rules: Includes 50 feet of rope, 10 pitons, a grappling hook, carabiners and other accoutrements.

name: Crowbar
rules: +1 vandalism to pry stuff open.

name: Explosives
rules: For each unit used, +1 vandalism to blow stuff up. D10 damage to everybody in the blast (Save vs Hazards negates). One use only.

name: Fire Extinguisher
rules: Puts out fires.

name: First-Aid Kit
rules: Contains bandages, splints and so on to provide emergency medical treatment in the field.

name: Flashlight
rules: lluminates an area.

name: Geiger Counter
rules: Allows radiation levels to be detected.

name: Glue
rules: Sticky stuff.

name: Handcuffs
rules: For restraining people.

name: Laptop Computer
rules: Does everything a computer does. Required in order to interact with computer code in the field.

name: Lighter
rules: Allows fires to be lit.

name: Lockpicks
rules: Required in order to pick normal locks.

name: Makeup Kit
rules: +1 to rolls to disguise yourself.

name: Metal Detector
rules: Goes beepwhen pointed at metal.

name: Mirror
rules: Reflects things.

name: Night-vision Goggles
rules: Lets you see in the dark. Bright light becomes painful.

name: Reload
rules: Allows a weapon to be used after running out of ammunition. 1 use per reload taken.

name: Scuba Gear
rules: Lets you breath underwater for an hour.

name: Shovel
rules: Useful for digging.

name: Smartphone
rules: Does everything a smartphone does.

name: Smoke Bombs
rules: Fill a fifteen foot area with smoke, blocking line of sight. You get 5.

name: Special Reload
rules: Allows a specialist weapon to be used after running out of ammunition. Applies only to one weapon, specify which for each special reload. One use per reload taken.

name: Sub-vocal Microphone
rules: Lets you communicate with everybody else in the party with a sub-vocal microphone al-most silently and at range.

name: Surgeonâ€™s Tools
rules: A complete set of medical tools, suitable for performing delicate surgery.

name: Toolbox
rules: Full of small saws, pliers, drills, hammers, nails, screwdrivers and so on.

name: Wooden Stakes
rules: Use them to jam open doors or kill vampires. You get 10.
